examples: It soon became apparent that no one was going to come.
Pronto se hizo evidente que nadie iba a venir.
It is becoming increasingly clear that something has gone seriously wrong.
Cada vez es más evidente que algo ha ido muy mal.
When did you first become aware of the problem?
¿Cuándo se dio cuenta del problema por primera vez?
It was becoming more and more difficult to live on his salary.
Cada vez era más difícil vivir de su salario.
